text: The 2020–21 season is Universo Treviso Basket's 9th in existence (6th after the re-foundation) and the club's 2nd consecutive season in the top tier Italian basketball. == Overview == == Kit == == Players == ===Current roster=== ===Depth chart=== ===Squad changes === ====In==== |} * *– Players who signed after the beginning of the season ====Out==== |} ==== Confirmed ==== |} ==== Coach ==== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! style="" | Nat. ! style="" | Name ! style="" | Age. ! colspan=2 style="" | Previous team ! style="" | Type ! style="" | Ends ! style="" | Date ! style="" | Source |- | | Massimiliano Menetti | | Reggio Emilia | | 3 + 3 | 2023 | 7 June 2018 | |} == Competitions == === Supercup === == References == Category:2020–21 in Italian basketball by club
